DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the present study was to determine the prone-to-supine displacement of breast lesions using preoperative prone MRI and supine second-look ultrasound data
DOC.brief_title: Feasibility Study of Supine Breast MRI : Comparison With Prone MRI and Comfort Assessment
DOC.criteria: The inclusion criteria were being a woman with breast lesions whose assessment involved breast MRI and ultrasound at our institution. There were no exclusion criteria.
